title: Integrative Musculoskeletal Care
description: Learn more about our services in Northern California and how we partner with you to create personalized care.
cleaned_text: When sore muscles, painful joints and creaky bones slow you down and keep you from enjoying the activities you love, it's time for action. Whether you're dealing with everyday aches and pains or more serious musculoskeletal conditions such as arthritis and osteoporosis, turn to an integrative health doctor in the Sutter Health network. Rather than simply masking or ignoring the pain, we'll work with you to uncover the physical and even emotional contributing factors. We'll help you develop a plan to address your needs holistically. Treatments may include adjustments from one of our board-certified chiropractors, therapeutic and energetic bodywork such as massage and reiki, stress relief and mindfulness training, functional medicine assessments, prescription medications and more. Our certified practitioners specialize in integrative musculoskeletal care for conditions including: - Arthritis - Back pain - Neck pain - Muscle weakness - Osteopenia - Osteoporosis - Posture and mobility problems
